description:
Kidstar baby diaper comes with a unique elastic waistband to fit with the baby's body perfectly and avoid leakage. Its cottony-soft top sheet keeps the baby dry and minimizes diaper rash. name: Savlon Twinkle Baby Diaper Belt XXL 15-30 kg
description:
If you’re looking for a healthy and comfortable diaper for your baby, Twinkle baby diaper is a good choice. Its absorbent core and dry lock ensure low rewet, keeping your baby’s skin healthy and dry. Its cottony soft top layer and stretchy bands ensure the maximum comfort for baby. Breathable outer layer allows air to circulate inside diaper, thus prevents dampness. The diaper’s leak protection layer and side barriers prevent any leakage. The in-built colour changing wetness indicator lets you know when it’s time for a diaper change.

description:

With up to 12 hours of dryness, these diapers ensure lasting comfort day and night. Mamy Poko Pants gives your baby a peaceful night sleep so that he wakes up smiling in the morning. The extra-dry core in this diaper can absorb up to six wetting.
